tool.name: SAGA.imagery_tools.13
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID_A False isArrayGRID_B False output_data_QUALITY $output_data_QUALITY output_data_CORRELATION $output_data_CORRELATION output_data_LUMINANCE $output_data_LUMINANCE output_data_CONTRAST $output_data_CONTRAST name SAGA.imagery_tools.13 GRID_A $GRID_A GRID_B $GRID_B K1 $K1 K2 $K2 L $L KERNEL_TYPE $KERNEL_TYPE KERNEL_RADIUS $KERNEL_RADIUS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_QUALITY $OutputSection_QUALITY.outputType_QUALITY transmissionMode_QUALITY $OutputSection_QUALITY.transmissionMode_QUALITY outputType_CORRELATION $OutputSection_CORRELATION.outputType_CORRELATION transmissionMode_CORRELATION $OutputSection_CORRELATION.transmissionMode_CORRELATION outputType_LUMINANCE $OutputSection_LUMINANCE.outputType_LUMINANCE transmissionMode_LUMINANCE $OutputSection_LUMINANCE.transmissionMode_LUMINANCE outputType_CONTRAST $OutputSection_CONTRAST.outputType_CONTRAST transmissionMode_CONTRAST $OutputSection_CONTRAST.transmissionMode_CONTRAST

param.name: GRID_A
param.label: First Grid
param.help: First Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: GRID_B
param.label: Second Grid
param.help: Second Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: L
param.label: L
param.help: The dynamic range for the image pixel, i.e. the number of different grey values.

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.label: Kernel Type
param.help: The shape of the filter kernel.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_QUALITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_QUALITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_CORRELATION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CORRELATION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_LUMINANCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_LUMINANCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_CONTRAST
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CONTRAST
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The Universal Image Quality Index compares two grids (greyscale images) using the three parameters luminance, contrast and structure. This is done for each pixel using a moving window as specified by the kernel radius.
